software.description: This is a multi-modal (T1w and DTI) brain template of monkeys with atlas labels of a cohort of 6 rhesus macaques scanned longitudinally at ages 2, 4 and 6 months of age. All T1w and DTI templates are with the same coordinates. The reference publication is "The effects of breastfeeding versus formula-feeding on cerebral cortex maturation in infant rhesus macaques", Neuroimage, 2018, in press (https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.201...).
